text: A frog lived happily in a deep swamp, away from the road, while her neighbor lived very proudly in a pond in the middle of the road. The one in the swamp insisted on her friend to move in with her, away from the road; that there she would be better and safer. But she did not let herself be persuaded, saying that it was very difficult for her to leave a home where she was already settled and satisfied. And it happened that one day he passed by the road, on the pond, a cart, and crushed the poor frog who refused to accept moving. If you have the opportunity to improve your position, don't turn it down.
title: La rana del pantano y la del camino
author: nan Esopo
